About LumenLumen is guided by our belief that humanity is at its best when technology advances the way we live and work. With 450,000 route fiber miles serving customers in more than 60 countries, we deliver the fastest, most secure global platform for applications and data to help businesses, government and communities deliver amazing experiences. Learn more about Lumen’s network, edge cloud, security and communication and collaboration solutions and our purpose to further human progress through technology at news.lumen.com, LinkedIn: /lumentechnologies, Twitter: @lumentechco, Facebook: /lumentechnologies, Instagram: @lumentechnologies and YouTube: /lumentechnologies.The RoleThe GrowthOS® is Lumen’s corporate venture studio responsible for launching and incubating new businesses that deliver remarkable value to our customers. As the Innovation function of the team grows, we’re looking for a strategic, passionate and entrepreneurial leaders to join us and lead the development of our GPU and AI initiatives.Within the Innovation Team, you will be responsible for execution of automation efforts that result in the most compelling platform in the industry. In this role you will be responsible for growing the number of integrated technologies that can be repeatably deployed anywhere the Lumen network can reach.The Main ResponsibilitiesResponsible for
